prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Extracts from the journal of Samuel Shepard, 1787-1796, 1F67M-683, Special Collections, University of Kentucky.

bioghist.p: Pioneer. Samuel Shepard was a native of Weston, Massachusetts who arrived in Kentucky in 1787. He settled in Georgetown and married Frankey Barlow in 1792.

scopecontent.p: This accession includes excerpts from a journal kept by Samuel Shepard on his journey down the Monongehela and Ohio Rivers in the 1780s. It offers details of several campaigns against the Indians.
